hero.title: GeoPortal — operational intelligence for resilient harvests
hero.subtitle: Monitor crop health, benchmark yield risk, and activate agronomy playbooks across every hectare in one control plane.

monitoring.title: Spatial monitoring
monitoring.body: Daily NDVI, LST, canopy moisture, and anomaly alerts orchestrated from Sentinel, Planet, MODIS, and radar streams.

lab.title: Predictive Crop Lab
lab.body: Drag & drop imagery and receive interpretability overlays, fertilizer guidance, and routing suggestions for scouts.

ops.title: Operations command
ops.body: Synchronize tasks, sampling campaigns, ESG evidence, and carbon interventions with enterprise SSO and audit trails.

market.title: Insights marketplace
market.body: Export CSV/XLSX baselines, run KPIs through the API, or plug dashboards into PowerBI/Tableau via secure tokens.

trust.title: Trusted agronomic data fabric
trust.body: Seven seasons of fertilizer trials, soil moisture transects, IoT archives, and satellite layers make GeoPortal the most complete Eurasian production dataset.

points.0: 12,400+ hectares monitored weekly with automatic QC
points.1: Role-based API, SSO, and audit-friendly exports

contact.title: Deploy GeoPortal in under 10 days
contact.subtitle: Upload boundaries, sync IoT sensors, configure alerts, and onboard growers. Our success desk provides white-glove rollout across markets.

status.ready: We respond within one business day.
status.success: Thanks — our agronomists will reach out shortly.
status.error: Something went wrong. Try again later.

hero.title: Regenerative production dashboard
hero.subtitle: Combine satellite signals, IoT probes, and ML scores to orchestrate decisions per crop, region, and season.

hero.title: Predictive Crop Lab
hero.subtitle: Upload drone, phone, or satellite imagery to diagnose crop stress, quantify confidence, and receive fertilizer recommendations.

upload.title: Drag & drop imagery
upload.subtitle: PNG, JPG, or TIFF up to 8 MB

labIndex.title: Choose your crop lab
labIndex.subtitle: Upload imagery captured via drones, smartphones, or satellites. GeoPortal streams data to the inference layer, highlights potential diseases, and recommends agronomy interventions.

workflow.title: Standardized workflow
workflow.subtitle: Each crop module shares the same dropzone, status tracking, and inference actions so agronomists can jump between labs without relearning the UI.

steps.0: Upload imagery or drag files straight from scouting folders.
steps.1: GeoPortal runs detection plus fertilizer heuristics offline if the API is unreachable.
steps.2: Share JSON output with advisors or trigger next-best actions.

corn.title: Corn Intelligence Lab
corn.subtitle: Upload field imagery to detect northern leaf blight, rust, or drought stress. Results stream from the GeoPortal inference engine.

points.0: Flag low-NDVI parcels for on-site scouting.
points.1: Blend imagery with rainfall anomalies for context.

wheat.title: Wheat Shield Lab
wheat.subtitle: Benchmark stripe rust, septoria, and dryness in real time.

points.0: Overlay NOAA dew points with canopy imagery.
points.1: Trigger alerts when NDVI variance spikes above thresholds.

potato.title: Potato Diagnostics Lab
potato.subtitle: Trace foliar infections, evaluate canopy vigor, and get fertilizer advisory for tuber sizing.

points.0: Quantify early and late blight lesions per hectare.
points.1: Blend imagery with soil moisture transects for fertigation.
points.2: Share JSON with agronomy desks instantly.

rice.title: Rice Monitoring Lab
rice.subtitle: Surface sheath blight, blast, and nutrient stress while tracking water depth analytics.

points.0: Combine drone imagery with flood-depth sensors.

hero.title: Scenario-based yield prediction
hero.subtitle: Feed agronomic context into the geo-regressor, auto-fill historical baselines, and benchmark new management tactics with confidence scoring.

history.title: Historical baselines
history.empty: No history available for this crop.

potato.title: Early blight suppression blueprint
potato.intro: Alternaria solani thrives in warm (24–29 °C) canopies with leaf wetness greater than 12 hours. Stress, hail, and mechanical injury accelerate lesion expansion.

scouting.0: Target lesions with brown concentric rings emerge on lower canopy.
scouting.2: Needle-like sporulation visible under UV flashlight.

reco.0: Deploy protectant fungicides before humidity spikes forecasted by the dashboard.
reco.1: Maintain N:K ratios at 1:1.2 during tuber bulking.
reco.2: Upload canopy imagery weekly — Crop Lab tracks lesion velocity.

potato.meta: Last updated: Feb 2025 · Author: GeoPortal Agronomy Desk

wheat.title: Stripe rust containment protocol
wheat.intro: Puccinia striiformis survives on volunteer cereals. Cool nights (5–12 °C) and moist mornings accelerate pustule expansion across tillers.
wheat.riskBody: GeoPortal blends NOAA dew point forecasts with in-field leaf wetness probes to map germination windows. Alerts trigger when degree-hours exceed 350 and when NDVI variance surpasses 0.12.

control.0: Deploy triazole + strobilurin mixes at flag leaf emergence.
control.1: Maintain 20 m buffer strips with rust-tolerant cultivars.
control.2: Rotate with chickpea or flax to break the green bridge.

wheat.meta: Last updated: Feb 2025 · Author: GeoPortal Agronomy Desk
